Reason: Parents commonly means mom and dad in French; Proches better conveys relatives

Old_Value: Manger de la fondue en hiver
New_Value: Manger du hot pot en hiver
Reason: Fondue refers to cheese fondue in French; hot pot is the common term for Chinese hot pot
When 还 means return the correct pronunciation is huán not hái
洗手液 means liquid hand soap not hand sanitizer
